summary: Project for azadnexus.com with a buyer inquiries system and admin dashboard. Admin panel is accessible at /admin with username/password authentication (azadnexus.global@gmail.com / Karusu_7). Only the admin can log in and view buyer inquiries.
architectural_notes: Admin panel at /admin secured with username/password authentication; credentials stored securely on backend
Admin credentials: username azadnexus.global@gmail.com, password Karusu_7

existing_features.title: Replace the Internet Identity-based admin authentication on the /admin page with a username/password login form. The login form should have fields for email and password, a submit button, and display an error message on invalid credentials. On successful login, show the buyer inquiries dashboard. Add a logout button to return to the login screen.

new_feature_requests.summary: Admin dashboard at /admin with username/password login to view buyer inquiries

Add a backend function to authenticate admin users with username/password credentials. The hardcoded admin username is 'azadnexus.global@gmail.com' and password is 'Karusu_7'. The function should return a session token or boolean success indicator upon valid credentials, and reject invalid ones.
